Do you have an android phone? Do you have a Two wheeler? Do you have a driving licence?g> Do you have experience in Sales? At Brand4Brands, one of our main priorities is the privacy of our visitors. This Privacy Policy document contains types of information that is collected and recorded by Brand4Brands and how we use it.
If you have additional questions or require more information about our Privacy Policy, do not hesitate to contact us. Brand4Brands follows a standard procedure of using log files. These files log visitors when they use app. The information collected by log files include internet protocol (IP) addresses, browser type, Internet Service Provider (ISP), date and time stamp, referring/exit pages, and possibly the number of clicks. These are not linked to any information that is personally identifiable. The purpose of the information is for analyzing trends, administering the app, tracking users' movement on the app, and gathering demographic information. You may consult this list to find the Privacy Policy for each of the advertising partners of Brand4Brands.
 Third-party ad servers or ad networks uses technologies like cookies, JavaScript, or Beacons that are used in their respective advertisements and links that appear on Brand4Brands. They automatically receive your IP address when this occurs. These technologies are used to measure the effectiveness of their advertising campaigns and/or to personalize the advertising content that you see on this app or other apps or websites.
 Note that Brand4Brands has no access to or control over these cookies that are used by third-party advertisers. Brand4Brands's Privacy Policy does not apply to other advertisers or websites. Thus, we are advising you to consult the respective Privacy Policies of these third-party ad servers for more detailed information. It may include their practices and instructions about how to opt-out of certain options. Another part of our priority is adding protection for children while using the internet. We encourage parents and guardians to observe, participate in, and/or monitor and guide their online activity.
Brand4Brands does not knowingly collect any Personal Identifiable Information from children under the age of 13. If you think that your child provided this kind of information on our App, we strongly encourage you to contact us immediately and we will do our best efforts to promptly remove such information from our records. This Privacy Policy applies only to our online activities and is valid for visitors to our App with regards to the information that they shared and/or collect in Brand4Brands. This policy is not applicable to any information collected offline or via channels other than this app. Our Privacy Policy was created with the help of the App Privacy Policy Generator from App-Privacy-Policy.com By using our app, you hereby consent to our Privacy Policy and agree to its Terms and Conditions. We are doing our best to prepare the content of this app. However, Brand4Brands cannot warranty the expressions and suggestions of the contents, as well as its accuracy. In addition, to the extent permitted by the law, Brand4Brands shall not be responsible for any losses and/or damages due to the usage of the information on our app. Our Disclaimer was generated with the help of the App Disclaimer Generator from App-Privacy-Policy.com 
By using our app, you hereby consent to our disclaimer and agree to its terms.
Any links contained in our app may lead to external sites are provided for convenience only. Any information or statements that appeared in these sites or app are not sponsored, endorsed, or otherwise approved by Brand4Brands. For these external sites, Brand4Brands cannot be held liable for the availability of, or the content located on or through it. Plus, any losses or damages occurred from using these contents or the internet generally. Welcome to Brand4Brands!
These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of Brand4Brands.
By using this app we assume you accept these terms and conditions. Do not continue to use Brand4Brands if you do not agree to take all of the terms and conditions stated on this page.
The following terminology applies to these Terms and Conditions, Privacy Statement and Disclaimer Notice and all Agreements:"Client", "You" and "Your" refers to you, the person log on this website and compliant to the Company’s terms and conditions. "The Company", "Ourselves", "We", "Our" and "Us", refers to our Company. "Party", "Parties", or "Us", refers to both the Client and ourselves. All terms refer to the offer, acceptance and consideration of payment necessary to undertake the process of our assistance to the Client in the most appropriate manner for the express purpose of meeting the Client’s needs in respect of provision of the Company’s stated services, in accordance with and subject to, prevailing law of Netherlands. Any use of the above terminology or other words in the singular, plural, capitalization and/or he/she or they, are taken as interchangeable and therefore as referring to same. Our Terms and Conditions were created with the help of the App Terms and Conditions Generator from App-Privacy-Policy.com Unless otherwise stated, Brand4Brands and/or its licensors own the intellectual property rights for all material on Brand4Brands. All intellectual property rights are reserved. You may access this from Brand4Brands for your own personal use subjected to restrictions set in these terms and conditions.
You must not:

 ❌ Republish material from Brand4Brands 
 ❌ Sell, rent or sub-license material from Brand4Brands
 ❌ Reproduce, duplicate or copy material from Brand4Brands
 ❌ Redistribute content from Brand4Brands

This Agreement shall begin on the date hereof.
Parts of this app offer an opportunity for users to post and exchange opinions and information in certain areas of the website. Brand4Brands does not filter, edit, publish or review Comments prior to their presence on the website. Comments do not reflect the views and opinions of Brand4Brands, its agents and/or affiliates. Comments reflect the views and opinions of the person who post their views and opinions. To the extent permitted by applicable laws, Brand4Brands shall not be liable for the Comments or for any liability, damages or expenses caused and/or suffered as a result of any use of and/or posting of and/or appearance of the Comments on this website.
Brand4Brands reserves the right to monitor all Comments and to remove any Comments which can be considered inappropriate, offensive or causes breach of these Terms and Conditions.
You warrant and represent that:
 ➡ You are entitled to post the Comments on our App and have all necessary licenses and consents to do so;

 ➡ The Comments do not contain any defamatory, libelous, offensive, indecent or otherwise unlawful material which is an invasion of privacy

You hereby grant Brand4Brands a non-exclusive license to use, reproduce, edit and authorize others to use, reproduce and edit any of your Comments in any and all forms, formats or media. The following organizations may link to our App without prior written approval:
 🔗 Government agencies;

These organizations may link to our home page, to publications or to other App information so long as the link: (a) is not in any way deceptive; (b) does not falsely imply sponsorship, endorsement or approval of the linking party and its products and/or services; and (c) fits within the context of the linking party’s site.

We will approve link requests from these organizations if we decide that: (a) the link would not make us look unfavorably to ourselves or to our accredited businesses; (b) the organization does not have any negative records with us; (c) the benefit to us from the visibility of the hyperlink compensates the absence of Brand4Brands; and (d) the link is in the context of general resource information.
These organizations may link to our App so long as the link: (a) is not in any way deceptive; (b) does not falsely imply sponsorship, endorsement or approval of the linking party and its products or services; and (c) fits within the context of the linking party’s site.
If you are one of the organizations listed in paragraph 2 above and are interested in linking to our App, you must inform us by sending an e-mail to Brand4Brands. Please include your name, your organization name, contact information as well as the URL of your site, a list of any URLs from which you intend to link to our App, and a list of the URLs on our site to which you would like to link. Wait 2-3 weeks for a response.
Approved organizations may hyperlink to our App as follows:
 ➡ By use of our corporate name; or

 ➡ No use of Brand4Brands's logo or other artwork will be allowed for linking absent a trademark license agreement. Without prior approval and written permission, you may not create frames around our Webpages that alter in any way the visual presentation or appearance of our App. We shall not be hold responsible for any content that appears on your App. You agree to protect and defend us against all claims that is rising on our App. No link(s) should appear on any Website that may be interpreted as libelous, obscene or criminal, or which infringes, otherwise violates, or advocates the infringement or other violation of, any third party rights. We reserve the right to request that you remove all links or any particular link to our App. You approve to immediately remove all links to our App upon request. We also reserve the right to amen these terms and conditions and it’s linking policy at any time. By continuously linking to our App, you agree to be bound to and follow these linking terms and conditions. If you find any link on our App that is offensive for any reason, you are free to contact and inform us any moment. We will consider requests to remove links but we are not obligated to or so or to respond to you directly.

We do not ensure that the information on this website is correct, we do not warrant its completeness or accuracy; nor do we promise to ensure that the website remains available or that the material on the website is kept up to date. To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, we exclude all representations, warranties and conditions relating to our App and the use of this website. Nothing in this disclaimer will:

The limitations and prohibitions of liability set in this Section and elsewhere in this disclaimer: (a) are subject to the preceding paragraph; and (b) govern all liabilities arising under the disclaimer, including liabilities arising in contract, in tort and for breach of statutory duty.
As long as the website and the information and services on the website are provided free of charge, we will not be liable for any loss or damage of any nature. A Field Sales Executive is responsible for promoting and selling a company's products or services directly to customers in various locations outside of a traditional office setting. The key responsibilities of a Field Sales Executive include: 
 
1.Identifying and developing new business opportunities through prospecting, networking, and relationship building.
2.Conducting market research and analysis to stay current with industry trends, market activities, and competitor information.
3.Developing and implementing sales strategies to meet or exceed sales targets.
4.Building and maintaining strong relationships with existing and potential customers.
5.Presenting products and services to customers and negotiating sales contracts.
6.Providing ongoing support to customers and addressing any post-sales issues.
7.Collaborating with other departments and team members to ensure customer satisfaction and achieve company goals.
8.Participating in training and development programs to improve sales skills and stay current with industry knowledge.

A successful Field Sales Executive should have excellent communication and interpersonal skills, strong sales skills, and a drive to succeed, as well as the ability to work independently and manage their time effectively. They should also have a track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets, and experience with territory management and account management You will be paid based on your performance, do you agree? This work is field work, do you agree to work on field? you must be able to visit atleast 3 customers per day, Do you agree? you must be able to promote our client's product to the customers, do you agree? What core values do you think every salesperson should have? How do you motivate yourself? How do you manage disappointments? What is the first thing you would do when sales are down? What are 3 things you do to build rapport with a prospect? How do you balance work and life? What is your knowledge about sales and marketing? Why do you want to work in sales and marketing industry? How do you keep up with industry trends Now, Please Self rate your communication Skills (1 being the least and 5 Being the Highest) Please Self rate your Convincing and negotiating skills (1 being the least and 5 Being the Highest) TrainingsTaskActivity Make sure to watch the video carefully before taking the assessment test, so you can show your best skills. This will help you avoid any potential issues with your application. Right after logging into the application what is the first thing that you should do everyday before starting work? While onboarding a merchant, the name used should be exactly the same as the one on the Bank passbook.? What is the minimum transaction amount? If the number being used for signup has not whitelisted, can the number still be used for registration? Which app needs to be download on the merchant's phone? Which of the following is not a mandatory field? Once the merchant is onboarded successfully, how is the QR code linked? 1. Go to Play store and download the airtel ranger app 
2. Make sure your number has been whitelisted and without whitelisting you cant proceed futher
3 New promoter need to signup with your mobile number which is whitelisted and need to create their own password
4 After completion of the signup and creating pw , login into the account with same numb and pw 
5. Go to check in section in the dashboard
6. It will be redirecting to 'Start my day' and capture your photo nd upload the photo and click on select and proceed 
7. And then you can again check on 'Start my day' and you will be able to 'your day aldready started' 
8. on the dashboard select 'onboard Merchant' 
9. Enter the mobile number of the customer and otp will be sent to the customer number 
10. Need to validate the customer via aadhar biometric/Aadhar otp/ Aadhar validation 
11. Need to enter the mandatory details of the customer like full name.DOB,Aadhar,mobile 
12. Next we need to enter the details of the shop like shop name,address,category of the shop 
13.Enter the details of the bank, select the settlement bank. 
either airtel or other payment banks- if airtel enter the mobile numb and if other enter bank acc numb and ifsc code
14. Now you have successfully onboarded the customer 
15. Now link the merchant qr code
16. Take a new qr code sticker and click on link qr code and scan the qr code 
17. This will validate the qr code and next click on home Click on Get Trained Button, go through the training video completely and understand the Process.

Once you have understood, click on Take Assessment and answer the questions and clear the assessment

Then, click on Start earning Button and submit the onboarded merchant details.

Once approved, your earnings will reflect in your wallet and you can withdraw your earnings to your bank account.
